content.title: Day 14 Log
content.body:
It's been a fortnight since the outbreak started. Almost everyone's been turned, with just me and a couple neighbors remaining.
We've stared on the quarantine dome, but I haven't been able to gather more supplies - everyone's house is overrun.
Got some basics stockpiled, but I doubt it will last for long.
I hope this dome plan works, and protects whoever is unfortunate enough to find this planet. If not, this disease could spread across the entire system - perhaps even the universe.
